<The Merrie Monarch Festival
1:
--------------------
Text: Merrie Monarch Festival:  It honors King David Kalākaua, who was called the "Merrie Monarch" for his patronage of the arts and is credited with restoring many Hawaiian cultural traditions during his reign, including the hula.
Triplets:<Merrie Monarch Festival
2:
--------------------
Text: Merrie Monarch Festival:  Many "hālau hula" (schools), including some from the U.S. mainland and some international performers, attend the festival each year to participate in exhibitions and competitions.
Triplets:<Merrie Monarch Festival
3:
--------------------
Text: Merrie Monarch Festival:  The festival has received worldwide attention and is considered the most prestigious of all hula contests.
